law.history: Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1982; amended ch. 141, sec. 133. -- Transferred 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1953, from C.C. sec. 619. --

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Other plaintiffs may be required to give security for costs -- When additional security may be required.
metadata.lrc-note: . This section was amended by 1982 Acts Chapter 141, Section 133 and repealed by 1982 Acts Chapter 118, Section 4. Pursuant to KRS 446.260, the repeal prevails.
